alert.note: Alert for Alleghany (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 7:41PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN ALLEGHANY AND NORTHEASTERN WILKES COUNTIES IN NORTHWESTERN NORTH CAROLINA THROUGH 815 PM EDT... At 741 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hays, or near North Wilkesboro, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... North Wilkesboro... Traphill... Mulberry... Roaring Gap... Stone Mountain State Park... Abshers... and Benham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
